price: Nuko Allah amurinda imigambi mibisha yabo bari bagambiriye, maze ibihano bibi bigota abantu ba Farawo.
arabic: فَوَقَىٰهُ ٱللَّهُ سَيِّـَٔاتِ مَا مَكَرُواْۖ وَحَاقَ بِـَٔالِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ سُوٓءُ ٱلۡعَذَابِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: fawaqāhu al-lahu sayyiāti mā makarū waḥāqa biāli fir'ʿawna sūu al-ʿadhābi
